source.oracleReaderQuery: select * from tankpac.supply_items where (ORDER_CODE,ORDER_SUPPLIER) in (select ORDER_CODE,ORDER_SUPPLIER from  tankpac.requisitions where extract(year from document_date) in (extract(year from sysdate),extract(year from sysdate)-1))

sqlReaderQuery.value: select name, datasetid from dbo.BD_refresh_job where flag = 1
